author: senh
title: Campfire ban continues another week in Oregon's state parks; rain on its way
text: BING NEWS: Campfire ban continues another week in Oregon's state parks; rain on its way With the forecast for a wet weekend in parts of the Pacific Northwest, conditions in Oregon's recreation areas may get some relief from the summer drought. But until then, the statewide campfire and open flame ban in Oregon state parks remains. The total ...
